name: One day in devil's lands
description:
This is a classic rogue like in top down view. You have to survive as many waves as you can, taking multiple bonus and fighting diverse ennemys. Just a fast but funny game which will not bored you I'm sure !

This is my better game until now ! It's also the first time that I make everything, I made the code, the sounds, the music and all the 3D models by myself. I'm really proud of what I did in one week only. I really want to update it in the next months.
